NEW_CARD.TITLE: Let's create your new card!
NEW_CARD.DESCRIPTION:
This wizard will help you create a new card.
You will be able to customize it to your liking and review it before creating it

EXTRAS.TITLE: Extras
EXTRAS.DESCRIPTION: Add some extra information to your card.

REVIEW.TITLE: Review
REVIEW.DESCRIPTION: Review your card before creating it.

CARDS.TITLE: {{collection.name}}'s available cards
CARDS.DESCRIPTION: Here you can see all the cards available in the collection {{collection.name}}.
